B

Bet - Class in HelperClasses
Class that represents a bet from a spectator.
Bet(SerializableHorse, int, int) - Constructor for class HelperClasses.Bet
Constructor
BETTING_CENTER_HOST_NAME - Static variable in class MainPackage.SimulationParameters
Betting center server host name.
BETTING_CENTER_NAME_ENTRY - Static variable in class MainPackage.SimulationParameters
Betting Center name entry for the register.
BETTING_CENTER_PORT - Static variable in class MainPackage.SimulationParameters
Betting center server port.
BettingCenterInterface - Interface in Interfaces
Betting Center interface to implement the stub for other entities.
BettingStrategy - Enum in HelperClasses
Class that contains the strategy for the spectator to bet on a race.
Broker - Class in MainPackage
Broker thread: Implements the life-cycle of the broker and stores the variables referent to the broker and his current state.
Broker(RacingTrackInterface, ControlCenterInterface, BettingCenterInterface, StableInterface) - Constructor for class MainPackage.Broker
Broker constructor
BrokerState - Enum in EntitiesState
Enum with the possible states of the broker on his lifecycle.
